base_uri.description: The base URI used in constructing URLs for this company.

full_domain.description: The full domain name associated with this company.

is_active.description: Indicates if the company is currently active.

week_start_day.description: The day considered the start of the week for this company.

wants_timestamp_timers.description: Indicates if the company wants timestamp timers displayed.

time_format.description: The format used to display time.

plan_type.description: The type of plan subscribed by the company.

expense_feature.description: Indicates if the expense feature is enabled for this company.

invoice_feature.description: Indicates if the invoice feature is enabled for this company.

estimate_feature.description: Indicates if the estimate feature is enabled for this company.

approval_required.description: Indicates if approval is required for certain actions.

clock.description: The clock configuration for time tracking.

decimal_symbol.description: The symbol used to separate the integer part from the fractional part of a number.

thousands_separator.description: The symbol used to separate thousands in a number.

color_scheme.description: The color scheme used in the user interface.

weekly_capacity.description: The weekly capacity setting for this company.
